about_the_game:
Control the proxy to battle enemies, upgrade skills, and find new weapons in this "relaxing" side-scrolling adventure game.

About this game

+ Auto move: The player chooses left and right for proxy to auto-move in that direction
+ Auto attack: when an enemy is in range, the proxy will auto attack the enemy, the player can stop the attack by toggle and using skill with QWER
+ Rougue-like, the player kills enemies and earns currency to permanently upgrade the proxy
+ Different maps and modes for different play styles
detailed_description:
Control the proxy to battle enemies, upgrade skills, and find new weapons in this "relaxing" side-scrolling adventure game.

About this game

+ Auto move: The player chooses left and right for proxy to auto-move in that direction
+ Auto attack: when an enemy is in range, the proxy will auto attack the enemy, the player can stop the attack by toggle and using skill with QWER
+ Rougue-like, the player kills enemies and earns currency to permanently upgrade the proxy
+ Different maps and modes for different play styles
name: Proxy Adventure: Small Test Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Control the proxy to battle enemies, upgrade skills and stats, find new weapons in this relaxing side-scrolling adventure game.
